 You have to be kidding? "Freedom and stuff like that"? STUFF? Our constitutional rights are now "stuff"? Dear God deliver me from people like this. 
 
 "Selective journalism. Tarring the reputation of ACORN with the misbehavior of a few individuals who work for ACORN".
 
 Newsflash for the ill informed: ACORN has long been a racist organization with more skullduggery than honesty in it's ranks. One of Obama's poster children from his old days as a door to door salesman of propaganda. 
 
 In one community alone, a group I worked with followed right behind ACORN validating voter registration. In 4 days we found over 200 false registrations. In other words...perjured registrations. The people were either real dead or were convicted felons. There were a also residents listed living in vacant lots. Tsk, tsk, tsk. We also took our findings to the media. Not ONE would investigate it nor would they air it. This happened all across the nation. The American people did not elect Obama, ACORN and like ilk did. It was the most crooked election ever held in this country and no one had the guts to challenge it. A VERY sad epitaph for America.
